name: Tina Night Fashion Dress Up Game
name_original: Tina Night Fashion Dress Up Game
description:
Tina is going out for fun tonight. She wants to do the most beautiful makeup and wear the most elegant dresses. Let's help her. Let's make it very stylish. Let's choose lipstick, hair color, blush and eye lens. Let's dress up in gorgeous dresses.

Tap the screen to play.
